question: A boy starting from his home, travels 6km towards east, then turning to his left he travels 6 km. After this he again turns left and travels 6 km. How far is the boy now from his home?
The unit digit of the product 1022 x 729 x 889 x 971 is? (unit digit = the rightmost digit of the final value)
What should be the next number (in place of ?) in the series: 11, 18, 27, 38, 51, ?
Stevan is twice as old as David. He will be thrice as old as Martin in 2 years. If Martin is 10 years old, how old will be Stevan after 10 years?
Adam travels the first 4 hours at 50mph speed and the remaining 6 hours at 25mph. Calculate the average speed of Adam in mph?
The word BAD is coded as FCD in a certain code language. In the same language, RAT will be coded as ___?
Alina and Luce can do a piece of work in 36 days and 81 days respectively. Both together work for 5 days and then Alina leaves off. How many days will Luce take to finish the remaining work?

Students in a college have to choose at least two subjects from chemistry, mathematics and physics. The number of students choosing all three subjects is 18, choosing physics as one of their subjects is 23 and choosing mathematics as one of their subjects is 25. The smallest possible number of students who could choose chemistry as one of their subjects is?

Vincent and Rosetta finally started their long planned farming business. Vincent invested $4332 for 18 months and Rosetta invested $3000 for 13 months. If both of them earned a profit of $2500 after 18 months then what is the profit share of Vincent?
